column4: When I right click a folder and select properties to view its size, the number is different from what I see when I use "Disk Usage Analyzer". Why is this?
can I pastebin what? There is nothing to paste? I simply want to know why nautilus says its 3.5GB, and "Disk Usage Analyzer" says its 3.9GB
what does du -sh say?  and does it happen with other directories?
